>
[Basic Maneuver](/Feats.aspx?ID=5082) <actions string="" />
</title>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 219 <sup>2.0</sup>

---

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level [fighter feat](/Feats.aspx?Traits=71).

<title level="2">Basic Maneuver leads to...</title>
